lines.text:
[First lines]
George Thomas Sullivan, I baptize thee in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Ghost.

[Last lines]
Tom, our boys are afloat again.

The flaming and undaunted spirit that is the heritage of its name. The five Sullivan boys are gone; the U.S.S. The Sullivans carries on. May God bless and protect this ship. May her destiny be as glorious as the name she bears.
